tag_list: video, social-video, marketing, beauty, cosmetics, word-of-mouth-marketing
overview:
As CEO of BeautyMotive Brendan leads business development efforts through lead generation & sales.

Brendan graduated from Umass Amherst with a double major in Communications & New Media. Currently he spends much of his time meeting with advisors & investors about growth and development opportunities.

Additionally, Brendan is BeautyMotive’s executive producer. In this capacity he oversees the development of all video content and works with vloggers and clients to facilitate brand message integration into all video content.

Brendan has a strong background in broadcast television production. Over the past 7 years he has produced and directed shows for networks like the History Channel, Discovery Channel, and National Geographic. In addition to large production companies he has also worked with several small tech-startup operations.

Brendan has witnessed the challenges facing TV production and advertising first-hand. His passion for BeautyMotive lies in the desire to crowd-source production from influencers themselves. By creating a seamless integration between advertising and content, Brendan plans to lead BeautyMotive as they contribute to new and evolving advertising paradigms.
